title: 如何给名字不为Go和Random的所有盔甲架的分数+1
author: 彪悍的新手
txt_content:
如何给名字不为Go和Random的所有盔甲架的分数（计分板名字是SjTd）+1
@e[name=!Go]和[name=!Random]怎么弄在一起

replies.author: hhttll
replies.txt_content:
彪悍的新手 发表于 2016-7-30 17:14
啊啊啊说错了是给名字不为Go和Random的其中一个盔甲架
那就
/scoreboard players tag @e[type=ArmorStand,name=Go] add blahblah
/scoreboard players tag @e[type=ArmorStand,name=Random] add blahblah
/scoreboard players add @r[type=ArmorStand,tag=!blahblah] SjTd 1
/scoreboard players tag @e[type=ArmorStand,tag=blahblah] remove blahblah

replies.author: hhttll
replies.txt_content:
/scoreboard players tag @e[type=ArmorStand,name=Go] add blahblah
/scoreboard players tag @e[type=ArmorStand,name=Random] add blahblah
/scoreboard players add @e[type=ArmorStand,tag=blahblah] SjTd 1
/scoreboard players tag @e[type=ArmorStand,tag=blahblah] remove blahblah

理论可行，未经过测试

replies.author: hhttll
replies.txt_content:
hhttll 发表于 2016-7-30 17:13
/scoreboard players tag @e[type=ArmorStand,name=Go] add blahblah
/scoreboard players tag @e[type=Arm ...
打错了！
/scoreboard players tag @e[type=ArmorStand,name=Go] add blahblah
/scoreboard players tag @e[type=ArmorStand,name=Random] add blahblah
/scoreboard players add @e[type=ArmorStand,tag=!blahblah] SjTd 1
/scoreboard players tag @e[type=ArmorStand,tag=blahblah] remove blahblah

replies.author: 彪悍的新手
replies.txt_content: 啊啊啊说错了是给名字不为Go和Random的其中一个盔甲架
